frame.name: Accuracy
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> is involved in an activity whose degree of success is dependent on a parameter of the action matching a particular set of values of a continuous variable or variables (e.g. quantity, location, time).
The <fen>Agent</fen>, or metonymically the <fen>Instrument</fen> or <fen>Means</fen> action, is described in terms of the actual or expected <fen>Deviation</fen> between the location, time, or quantity in the activity and the location, time, or quantity which is necessary for the intended event.
<ex><fex name="Instrument">The Longview Rangefinder</fex> is <t>accurate</t> <fex name="Deviation">to within one foot per hundred yards</fex> .</ex> <ex><fex name="Means">His estimate</fex> was <t>off</t> <fex name="Deviation">by an order of magnitude</fex> .</ex>
<ex><fex name="Agent">The fork truck operator</fex> must be <fex name="Degree">fairly</fex> <t>accurate</t> <fex name="Means">in his aim</fex>.</ex>
<ex>The <t>precision</t> <fex name="Means">of the daily measurements</fex> is dependent on a number of factors.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual who tries to interact with the <fen>Target</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">The mailman</fex> is very <t>exact</t> about addresses -- he has to be .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Target
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Target</fen> is the entity whose attributes (esp. position) the <fen>Agent</fen> is attempting to match in an action.</def-root>

FE.name: Outcome
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Outcome</fen> is the failure or success of an attempt at interaction, incorporated in the LUs of the frame. </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to hit a <fen>Target_value</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>How closely the expected or actual location that the <fen>Instrument</fen> interacts with corresponds to the <fen>Target_value</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when something hits or misses.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The place where the <fen>Agent</fen> manages or fails to interact with the <fen>Target</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Instrument
FE.definition: <def-root>The object manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to interact with the <fen>Target</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Target_value
FE.definition: <def-root>The value or values for a parameter that match the <fen>Agent</fen>'s intent. </def-root>

FE.name: Deviation
FE.definition:
<def-root>Expected or actual deviation from the <fen>Target_value</fen>.
<ex>For this they would need a thermometer <t>accurate</t> <fex name="Deviation">to within a microkelvin</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The particular aspect or domain in which something is accurate. </def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the event itself and any of its participants. </def-root>
